alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 11:27PM CDT until July 29 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Logan County in west central Kansas... Northwestern Gove County in west central Kansas... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1127 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Oakley, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Logan and northwestern Gove Counties. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 76 and 82. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to localized flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
